# Links to official texts

Read *ℓ*-1825 in the INTF website [here](https://ntvmr.uni-muenster.de/manuscript-workspace?docID=41825).

Download the Robinson-Pierpont 2018 edition of the Byzantine textform [here](https://web.archive.org/web/20210413060536/https://byzantinetext.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/robinson-pierpont-2018-gnt-edition.pdf).

::: {.callout-note appearance="minimal" icon="false" collapse="true"}
# Conventions

| Description                                                              	| Examples                           	|
|--------------------------------------------------------------------------	|------------------------------------	|
| Word in both Byz^RP^ and *ℓ*-1825                                   	| λογος                              	|
| *ℓ*-1825 *adds* (word not present in Byz^RP^)                       	| [λογος]{.greek-added}            	|
| *ℓ*-1825 *omits* (word present in Byz^RP^)                          	| [λογος]{.greek-omitted}          	|
| Text fragmentary, supplied by transcriber of *ℓ*-1825               	| [λογος]{.greek-supplied}         	|
| Text unclear, supplied by transcriber of *ℓ*-1825                   	| [λογος]{.unclear}                	|
| Corrector's hand is superscript (corrector agrees with Byz^RP^)          	| [λογος]{.corr}                   	|
| Corrector's hand is superscript (corrector adds, not present in Byz^RP^) 	| [[λογος]{.corr}]{.greek-added} 	|
| *ℓ*-1825 abbreviates *nomen sacrum*                                 	| [θεος]{.greek-abbr}            	|
| Gap in *ℓ*-1825                                                     	| [―]{.gap}                        	|
:::
